HDG.LOG.content: a protection in which what lies before remains (bleibt) laid down: stored, laid away, secured & deposited in unconcealment (Unverborgenheit), sheltered in unconcealment > the keisthai of upokeimenon: presencing (Anwesen) of that which lies before us into unconcealment: legein concerns safety (Geborgenheit), safekeeping, gathering appropriate to such a laying [what about annihilation?], safety of that which comes together into presence (des beisammen-Anwesenden)
HDG.LOG.linkedContent: a protection in which what lies before remains (bleibt) laid down: stored, laid away, secured & deposited in unconcealment (Unverborgenheit), sheltered in unconcealment > the keisthai of upokeimenon: presencing (Anwesen) of that which lies before us into unconcealment: legein concerns safety (Geborgenheit), safekeeping, gathering appropriate to such a laying [what about annihilation?], safety of that which comes together into presence (des beisammen-Anwesenden)

HDG.LOG.content: omologein as when fateful comes to pass, proper hearing [when does fateful not come to pass? Nietzsche, Derrida], the laying that gathering has sent (die lesende Lege geschickt hat): where, and as what, does the fateful presence?
HDG.LOG.linkedContent: omologein as when fateful comes to pass, proper hearing [when does fateful not come to pass? Nietzsche, Derrida], the laying that gathering has sent (die lesende Lege geschickt hat): where, and as what, does the fateful presence?

HDG.LOG.content: logos essentially occurs as en panta [wholeness] > [all uniting is the one, gathering, centrifugal] > logos, gathering everything (alles) in the totality (All) of simple presencing? > Der logos legt ins Anwesen vor und legt das Anwesende ins Anwesen nieder, d.h. zurück [heterotautology: laying back into presence what is present before] > presencing: having come forward to endure in unconcealment (hervorgekommen im Unverborgenen währen) [endure, linger awhile, totality]
HDG.LOG.linkedContent: logos essentially occurs as en panta [wholeness] > [all uniting is the one, gathering, centrifugal] > logos, gathering everything (alles) in the totality (All) of simple presencing? > Der logos legt ins Anwesen vor und legt das Anwesende ins Anwesen nieder, d.h. zurück [heterotautology: laying back into presence what is present before] > presencing: having come forward to endure in unconcealment (hervorgekommen im Unverborgenen währen) [endure, linger awhile, totality]

HDG.LOG.content: [lays what is present before into presence] > all disclosure releases (Entbergen enthebt) what is present from concealment [Lacan, return of repressed] > forgetting as a reservoir to draw from [aletheia, trace]
HDG.LOG.linkedContent: [lays what is present before into presence] > all disclosure releases (Entbergen enthebt) what is present from concealment [Lacan, return of repressed] > forgetting as a reservoir to draw from [aletheia, trace]

HDG.BC.content: [indifference point not dialectical sublation] Hegel could never say “Actuality” and nothing are the same, though he does realize both are most extreme abstractions of “actuality” > attend to the following only in passing [?]: Nothing presences, not the nullity people apply to it > when Nothing rests on fancy, mere play of understanding, the emptiest & the unique [just like Being] > Nothing not a nullity (for us): horror towards devastation, recoiling in terror of annihilation: shrinking back from something that can’t be addressed as mere imagination or something baseless
HDG.BC.linkedContent: [indifference point not dialectical sublation] Hegel could never say “Actuality” and nothing are the same, though he does realize both are most extreme abstractions of “actuality” > attend to the following only in passing [?]: Nothing presences, not the nullity people apply to it > when Nothing rests on fancy, mere play of understanding, the emptiest & the unique [just like Being] > Nothing not a nullity (for us): horror towards devastation, recoiling in terror of annihilation: shrinking back from something that can’t be addressed as mere imagination or something baseless

HDG.BC.content: philosophical critique of contemporary physics [science], reflection can’t limit itself to examination of “law of causality” > predictability a principle of knowledge of beings, so even physics converts ontological law into “epistemological principle” (an error, a fall), “quantum metaphysics” > science helps indicate “being” as most intelligible (hardly noticed attitude at bottom of claim of physics)
HDG.BC.linkedContent: philosophical critique of contemporary physics [science], reflection can’t limit itself to examination of “law of causality” > predictability a principle of knowledge of beings, so even physics converts ontological law into “epistemological principle” (an error, a fall), “quantum metaphysics” > science helps indicate “being” as most intelligible (hardly noticed attitude at bottom of claim of physics)

HDG.BC.content: inception has been, but not something past [inheritance], still presences, but concealed in its incipience [trace], perhaps inception of Being closer to us than everything we know, imperishable (Unvergängliche) [indestructible] > remembrance of inception not concerned w/ beings [how so???], but w/ what has been, i.e. what still presences
HDG.BC.linkedContent: inception has been, but not something past [inheritance], still presences, but concealed in its incipience [trace], perhaps inception of Being closer to us than everything we know, imperishable (Unvergängliche) [indestructible] > remembrance of inception not concerned w/ beings [how so???], but w/ what has been, i.e. what still presences

HDG.TB.content: our task: trace Being to its own from Appropriation (w/out regard to relation of Being to beings) [beyond ontological difference? beyond metaphysics?], think Being w/ out regard to metaphysics > but regard for metaphysics still prevails, thus our task is to cease all overcoming [of metaphysics], leave metaphysics to itself
HDG.TB.linkedContent: our task: trace Being to its own from Appropriation (w/out regard to relation of Being to beings) [beyond ontological difference? beyond metaphysics?], think Being w/ out regard to metaphysics > but regard for metaphysics still prevails, thus our task is to cease all overcoming [of metaphysics], leave metaphysics to itself

HDG.WM.content: metaphysics: inquiry beyond or over beings, aims to recover them as a whole for our grasp
HDG.WM.linkedContent: metaphysics: inquiry beyond or over beings, aims to recover them as a whole for our grasp

HDG.WM.content: presumed soberness of mind, superiority of science: laughable when doesn’t take nothing seriously > it’s only because nothing is manifest that science can make beings themselves objects of investigation > new task of science (its essential task) to exist on basis of metaphysics, disclose entire expanse of truth in nature & history [?]
HDG.WM.linkedContent: presumed soberness of mind, superiority of science: laughable when doesn’t take nothing seriously > it’s only because nothing is manifest that science can make beings themselves objects of investigation > new task of science (its essential task) to exist on basis of metaphysics, disclose entire expanse of truth in nature & history [?]

HDG.WM.content: going beyond beings occurs in essence of Dasein > this going beyond is metaphysics itself—thus, metaphysics belongs to “nature of the human being” > “because the truth of metaphysics dwells in this abyssal ground [hermeneutic circle of Dasein & metaphysics] it stands in closest proximity to the constantly lurking possibility of deepest error” > [but philosophy was born?] the getting under way of metaphysics, the coming to itself of philosophy, to its explicit tasks
HDG.WM.linkedContent: going beyond beings occurs in essence of Dasein > this going beyond is metaphysics itself—thus, metaphysics belongs to “nature of the human being” > “because the truth of metaphysics dwells in this abyssal ground [hermeneutic circle of Dasein & metaphysics] it stands in closest proximity to the constantly lurking possibility of deepest error” > [but philosophy was born?] the getting under way of metaphysics, the coming to itself of philosophy, to its explicit tasks

HDG.WM.content: for philosophy to get underway: 1) allow space for beings as a whole 2) release ourselves into the nothing, liberate ourselves from idols 3) let sweep of our suspense (Schwebens) take its full course, so it swings back to fundamental question of metaphysics [possibility of “why” makes it possible to ground things > destiny of our existence placed in hands of researcher (Forschers) (Nietzsche)] [destiny, question, ground of metaphysics, beyond metaphysics]
HDG.WM.linkedContent: for philosophy to get underway: 1) allow space for beings as a whole 2) release ourselves into the nothing, liberate ourselves from idols 3) let sweep of our suspense (Schwebens) take its full course, so it swings back to fundamental question of metaphysics [possibility of “why” makes it possible to ground things > destiny of our existence placed in hands of researcher (Forschers) (Nietzsche)] [destiny, question, ground of metaphysics, beyond metaphysics]

HDG.IWM.content: metaphysics thinks/represents beings as (only) beings, owes this sight to the light of Being > this light itself, what metaphysics sees as light, no longer w/in range of metaphysics
HDG.IWM.linkedContent: metaphysics thinks/represents beings as (only) beings, owes this sight to the light of Being > this light itself, what metaphysics sees as light, no longer w/in range of metaphysics

HDG.IWM.content: truth of Being called ground, that which nourishes root of tree of philosophy (i.e. metaphysics) > in the ground, roots forget themselves for sake of tree > philosophy doesn’t gather itself upon its ground, always leaves (never escapes) its ground, by means of metaphysics
HDG.IWM.linkedContent: truth of Being called ground, that which nourishes root of tree of philosophy (i.e. metaphysics) > in the ground, roots forget themselves for sake of tree > philosophy doesn’t gather itself upon its ground, always leaves (never escapes) its ground, by means of metaphysics

HDG.IWM.content: thinking that sets out to experience ground of metaphysics, attempt to recall truth of Being > [totally other, beyond Being] from point of view of metaphysics ground appears as ground [cf. 279n Being as nonground (Nichtgrund), X ground], presumably something else experienced in its own terms, something as yet unsaid, something other than metaphysics
HDG.IWM.linkedContent: thinking that sets out to experience ground of metaphysics, attempt to recall truth of Being > [totally other, beyond Being] from point of view of metaphysics ground appears as ground [cf. 279n Being as nonground (Nichtgrund), X ground], presumably something else experienced in its own terms, something as yet unsaid, something other than metaphysics

HDG.IWM.content: as long as man understands himself as rational animal, metaphysics belongs (as Kant says) to nature of man
HDG.IWM.linkedContent: as long as man understands himself as rational animal, metaphysics belongs (as Kant says) to nature of man

HDG.IWM.content: why overcoming of metaphysics [Destruction] is necessary?
metaphysics as barrier that refuses human beings primordial relation (anfänglichen Bezug) of Being to the human essence [cf. 281n X Being]
HDG.IWM.linkedContent: metaphysics as barrier that refuses human beings primordial relation (anfänglichen Bezug) of Being to the human essence [cf. 281n X Being]

HDG.IWM.content: overcoming of metaphysics [Destruction] corresponded to endeavor to first learn to attend to oblivion of Being, to experience this oblivion, absorb this experience into relation of Being to man, preserve (verwahren) it there [ontological difference & Being] > in the need (Not) belonging to oblivion of Being, question: “What is metaphysics?” perhaps most necessary for thought > [Destruction] representational thought relinquished to thinking brought to pass (ereignetes) by Being itself, in thrall to Being (um dem Sein höriges Denken) [MOP, telos]: more thoughtful our thinking becomes, more purely our thinking will stand of its own accord in sole action appropriate to it [attention to Being]
HDG.IWM.linkedContent: overcoming of metaphysics [Destruction] corresponded to endeavor to first learn to attend to oblivion of Being, to experience this oblivion, absorb this experience into relation of Being to man, preserve (verwahren) it there [ontological difference & Being] > in the need (Not) belonging to oblivion of Being, question: “What is metaphysics?” perhaps most necessary for thought > [Destruction] representational thought relinquished to thinking brought to pass (ereignetes) by Being itself, in thrall to Being (um dem Sein höriges Denken) [MOP, telos]: more thoughtful our thinking becomes, more purely our thinking will stand of its own accord in sole action appropriate to it [attention to Being]

HDG.IWM.content: Greek already ontotheological > metaphysics always has twofold character, but closed off to reason/origin of twofold, it is what it is: representation of beings as beings > metaphysics has no choice: metaphysics by its very essence excluded from experience of Being
HDG.IWM.linkedContent: Greek already ontotheological > metaphysics always has twofold character, but closed off to reason/origin of twofold, it is what it is: representation of beings as beings > metaphysics has no choice: metaphysics by its very essence excluded from experience of Being

HDG.IWM.content: fundamental ontology (attempt to inquire back), like any title, soon seen to be inappropriate [beyond Being then?], misleading because says something correct from point of view of metaphysics > what matters is undertaking transition [not there yet] from metaphysics to recalling truth of Being > thinking that calls itself “fundamental ontology” blocks/obscures its own path by very designation > attempt to recall truth of Being, going back into ground of metaphysics [Destruction], already left realm of all ontology w/ 1st step [was that step ever taken?] > wherever indirect/direct representation of “transcendence” remains: ontology [cf. On The Essence of Ground p. 125] [cf. OG pp. 22-3]
HDG.IWM.linkedContent: fundamental ontology (attempt to inquire back), like any title, soon seen to be inappropriate [beyond Being then?], misleading because says something correct from point of view of metaphysics > what matters is undertaking transition [not there yet] from metaphysics to recalling truth of Being > thinking that calls itself “fundamental ontology” blocks/obscures its own path by very designation > attempt to recall truth of Being, going back into ground of metaphysics [Destruction], already left realm of all ontology w/ 1st step [was that step ever taken?] > wherever indirect/direct representation of “transcendence” remains: ontology [cf. On The Essence of Ground p. 125] [cf. OG pp. 22-3]

HDG.IWM.content: Nothing understood as Being itself > Heidegger reframes fundamental question of metaphysics: “how does it come about that with Being It [cf. 290n For metaphysics] is really nothing and that the Nothing does not properly prevail?” [i.e. how does metaphysics forget Being as Nothing?]
HDG.IWM.linkedContent: Nothing understood as Being itself > Heidegger reframes fundamental question of metaphysics: “how does it come about that with Being It [cf. 290n For metaphysics] is really nothing and that the Nothing does not properly prevail?” [i.e. how does metaphysics forget Being as Nothing?]

HDG.QB.content: [khōra] Jünger’s Gestalt stamps/shapes its “forms” > Gestalt of worker corresponds to projection of essential Gestalt of Zarathustra w/in metaphysics of will to power [subjectity vs. subjectivity?]
HDG.QB.linkedContent: [khōra] Jünger’s Gestalt stamps/shapes its “forms” > Gestalt of worker corresponds to projection of essential Gestalt of Zarathustra w/in metaphysics of will to power [subjectity vs. subjectivity?]

HDG.QB.content: essence of human being, “Dasein in human being,” is nothing human [the trace, totally other] > when the idea of human essence grounds everything present (i.e. human authoritative, underlying ground): secures beings in their being, (human essence is the presence that first) permits “representation”
HDG.QB.linkedContent: essence of human being, “Dasein in human being,” is nothing human [the trace, totally other] > when the idea of human essence grounds everything present (i.e. human authoritative, underlying ground): secures beings in their being, (human essence is the presence that first) permits “representation”

HDG.QB.content: transcendence ambiguous for essential reasons w/in metaphysics > meanings of transcendence: 1) relation proceeding from beings & passing over to being 2) relation leading from changeable beings to an entity that is at rest 3) supreme entity itself > meta-physical in metaphysics = transcendence
HDG.QB.linkedContent: transcendence ambiguous for essential reasons w/in metaphysics > meanings of transcendence: 1) relation proceeding from beings & passing over to being 2) relation leading from changeable beings to an entity that is at rest 3) supreme entity itself > meta-physical in metaphysics = transcendence

HDG.QB.content: from early period of Greek civilization to recent period of our century, “being” has meant: presencing (Anwesen) [not for you?] > every presence (Praesenz) stems from Ereignis of presence (Anwesenheit) [which way to read this genitive?]
HDG.QB.linkedContent: from early period of Greek civilization to recent period of our century, “being” has meant: presencing (Anwesen) [not for you?] > every presence (Praesenz) stems from Ereignis of presence (Anwesenheit) [which way to read this genitive?]

HDG.QB.content: [responding to Jünger on whether one doesn’t need certain concepts—only comprehension of an actuality] our concern not only w/ concepts of science but w/ fundamental words like Gestalt, domination (Herrschaft), representation (Repräsentation), power, will, value, security (Sicherheit), presence (Praesenz) (presencing [Anwesen]), nothing > fundamental words (Grundworten) of thinking are an other kind than metaphysical concepts > in latter: that which concepts (Begriffen) grasp (begreifen) same as this very grasping (Begreifen) [strange phrasing on the difference btwn forgetting fundamental words and using them unexamined]
HDG.QB.linkedContent: [responding to Jünger on whether one doesn’t need certain concepts—only comprehension of an actuality] our concern not only w/ concepts of science but w/ fundamental words like Gestalt, domination (Herrschaft), representation (Repräsentation), power, will, value, security (Sicherheit), presence (Praesenz) (presencing [Anwesen]), nothing > fundamental words (Grundworten) of thinking are an other kind than metaphysical concepts > in latter: that which concepts (Begriffen) grasp (begreifen) same as this very grasping (Begreifen) [strange phrasing on the difference btwn forgetting fundamental words and using them unexamined]

HDG.QB.content: nothing, which as absence interrupts (Abbruch) (“nullifies [nichtet]”) presence, w/out ever annihilating it > insofar as nothing “nullifies,” it confirms itself as a distinctive presence, veiling itself as such presence
HDG.QB.linkedContent: nothing, which as absence interrupts (Abbruch) (“nullifies [nichtet]”) presence, w/out ever annihilating it > insofar as nothing “nullifies,” it confirms itself as a distinctive presence, veiling itself as such presence

HDG.QB.content: to connect “work” & “pain”: think fundamental trait of Hegel’s metaphysics: “absolute negativity” as “infinite force” of actuality, i.e., of the “existing concept” > work & pain manifest their innermost metaphysical relatedness in same (not identical) belonging to negation of negation
HDG.QB.linkedContent: to connect “work” & “pain”: think fundamental trait of Hegel’s metaphysics: “absolute negativity” as “infinite force” of actuality, i.e., of the “existing concept” > work & pain manifest their innermost metaphysical relatedness in same (not identical) belonging to negation of negation

HDG.QB.content: [immense degree of waiting] perhaps moment will come [not yet] when essence of nihilism will show itself more clearly in other ways, in brighter light, until then setting out on a path that leads to a discussion of essence of Being, on this path alone can question concerning the nothing be discussed (must relinquish language of metaphysics [does that include Being?], but [still?] subject to other demands than changing an old terminology for a new one [paleonym] > endeavor to undertake transformation will presumably remain tentative for a long time [not yet there, telos], that’s not an adequate reason for failing to undertake it
HDG.QB.linkedContent: [immense degree of waiting] perhaps moment will come [not yet] when essence of nihilism will show itself more clearly in other ways, in brighter light, until then setting out on a path that leads to a discussion of essence of Being, on this path alone can question concerning the nothing be discussed (must relinquish language of metaphysics [does that include Being?], but [still?] subject to other demands than changing an old terminology for a new one [paleonym] > endeavor to undertake transformation will presumably remain tentative for a long time [not yet there, telos], that’s not an adequate reason for failing to undertake it

HDG.QB.content: by no means easier to say “being” than to speak of the nothing > shows how once more, inevitably, everything depends (ankommt) on correct saying (rechte Sagen), the logos whose essence logic/dialectic of metaphysics can never experience > is it due to “being” (as Same) that our saying fails? all too readily suspected as so-called “mysticism”? > [beyond Being, Derrida] would the crossing of the line leave language of fundamental words to whim of those who are speaking? enough for language to be universally comprehensible? or do other [uniquely unique] laws/measures prevail here [totally other]? (these questions are scarcely beginning to become worthy of question—to feel home in them)
HDG.QB.linkedContent: by no means easier to say “being” than to speak of the nothing > shows how once more, inevitably, everything depends (ankommt) on correct saying (rechte Sagen), the logos whose essence logic/dialectic of metaphysics can never experience > is it due to “being” (as Same) that our saying fails? all too readily suspected as so-called “mysticism”? > [beyond Being, Derrida] would the crossing of the line leave language of fundamental words to whim of those who are speaking? enough for language to be universally comprehensible? or do other [uniquely unique] laws/measures prevail here [totally other]? (these questions are scarcely beginning to become worthy of question—to feel home in them)

HDG.QB.content: for Jünger, reduction characteristic of nihilistic trends; for Heidegger, reduction w/in Beings rests in a production of Being: unfolding of will to power into unconditional will to will [using destiny to affirm fuzzy assessments of an epoch] > the disappearance (Schwund) (absence) determined out of/through a presence (Praesenz), such presence precedes/surpasses all that disappears [nihilism & metaphysics as same destiny, Nietzsche]
HDG.QB.linkedContent: for Jünger, reduction characteristic of nihilistic trends; for Heidegger, reduction w/in Beings rests in a production of Being: unfolding of will to power into unconditional will to will [using destiny to affirm fuzzy assessments of an epoch] > the disappearance (Schwund) (absence) determined out of/through a presence (Praesenz), such presence precedes/surpasses all that disappears [nihilism & metaphysics as same destiny, Nietzsche]

HDG.QB.content: surpassing (Überstieg) is metaphysics itself, not a doctrine, but fact that such surpassing is “given” > given in sense of brought onto path of its prevailing, destined > destiny of (objective genitive [control genitive]) metaphysics: incalculable fullness/suddenness (unberechenbare Fülle und Jähe) of what unfolds as surpassing > acc. this destiny, human representation (Vorstellen) itself becomes metaphysical > the surpassing that returns to beings, “the transcendens pure & simple,” is “the being” of beings
HDG.QB.linkedContent: surpassing (Überstieg) is metaphysics itself, not a doctrine, but fact that such surpassing is “given” > given in sense of brought onto path of its prevailing, destined > destiny of (objective genitive [control genitive]) metaphysics: incalculable fullness/suddenness (unberechenbare Fülle und Jähe) of what unfolds as surpassing > acc. this destiny, human representation (Vorstellen) itself becomes metaphysical > the surpassing that returns to beings, “the transcendens pure & simple,” is “the being” of beings

HDG.QB.content: essence of nihilism is nothing nihilistic [a thought that palliates disagreeableness of thought of Verwindung of metaphysics] > Ge-stell when withdrawal of Being is represented nihilistically, that which presences as standing reserve (Bëstandigkeit) seems self-sufficient > X Being remains absent in strange way, maintains itself in a concealment that conceals itself [oblivion: a sheltering that preserves]
HDG.QB.linkedContent: essence of nihilism is nothing nihilistic [a thought that palliates disagreeableness of thought of Verwindung of metaphysics] > Ge-stell when withdrawal of Being is represented nihilistically, that which presences as standing reserve (Bëstandigkeit) seems self-sufficient > X Being remains absent in strange way, maintains itself in a concealment that conceals itself [oblivion: a sheltering that preserves]

HDG.QB.content: recovery (Verwindung) of metaphysics is recovery of oblivion of Being, recovery turns (Verwindung wendet sich) toward essence of metaphysics > in order to respond to recovery must first clarify essence of metaphysics [not yet there? Destruction still required?] > “in this recovery, the enduring truth (bleibende Wahrheit) of metaphysics that has seemingly been rejected first returns explicitly (kehrt erst eigens zurück) as the now appropriated (angeeignetes) essence of metaphysics”
HDG.QB.linkedContent: recovery (Verwindung) of metaphysics is recovery of oblivion of Being, recovery turns (Verwindung wendet sich) toward essence of metaphysics > in order to respond to recovery must first clarify essence of metaphysics [not yet there? Destruction still required?] > “in this recovery, the enduring truth (bleibende Wahrheit) of metaphysics that has seemingly been rejected first returns explicitly (kehrt erst eigens zurück) as the now appropriated (angeeignetes) essence of metaphysics”

HDG.QB.content: every restoration (Restauration) is an interpretation of metaphysics [but recovery or metaphysics not a mere restoration?] > Heidegger on “Destruction,” not a demolishing (Zertrümmerung) of metaphysics, intended only to reattain originary experiences of Being belonging to metaphysics by deconstructing (Abbau) representations that have become commonplace/empty
HDG.QB.linkedContent: every restoration (Restauration) is an interpretation of metaphysics [but recovery or metaphysics not a mere restoration?] > Heidegger on “Destruction,” not a demolishing (Zertrümmerung) of metaphysics, intended only to reattain originary experiences of Being belonging to metaphysics by deconstructing (Abbau) representations that have become commonplace/empty

HDG.QB.content: when question “What is…?” concerned w/ discussing (erörtern) the surpassing (Überstieg) of beings by Being, this surpassing immediately calls into question elements distinguished from one another in that distinction (Unterscheidung) [beyond ontological difference], the distinction in which doctrine of metaphysics moves, or from which metaphysics receives basic outline (Grundriss) of its language (essence/existence, what-being/that-being)
HDG.QB.linkedContent: when question “What is…?” concerned w/ discussing (erörtern) the surpassing (Überstieg) of beings by Being, this surpassing immediately calls into question elements distinguished from one another in that distinction (Unterscheidung) [beyond ontological difference], the distinction in which doctrine of metaphysics moves, or from which metaphysics receives basic outline (Grundriss) of its language (essence/existence, what-being/that-being)

HDG.QB.content: sciences believe representation of being exhausts entire realm of what can be researched, apart from beings there’s “nothing else” > metaphysics distinguished by science by the surpassing: Being of beings > for science, Being can only present itself as nothing > how do things stand w/ that which is totally other (ganz Anderen) than anything that is, that which is not a being (i.e. Being)? [Being not crossed out]
HDG.QB.linkedContent: sciences believe representation of being exhausts entire realm of what can be researched, apart from beings there’s “nothing else” > metaphysics distinguished by science by the surpassing: Being of beings > for science, Being can only present itself as nothing > how do things stand w/ that which is totally other (ganz Anderen) than anything that is, that which is not a being (i.e. Being)? [Being not crossed out]

HDG.QB.content: Dasein “held into (hineingehalten)” “this” nothing: humans hold free the site (Ort) for the totally other (ganz Anderen) than beings, so that w/in this openness something like coming to presence (An-Wesen) (Being) can be given > Der Mensch ist der Platzhalter des Nichts
HDG.QB.linkedContent: Dasein “held into (hineingehalten)” “this” nothing: humans hold free the site (Ort) for the totally other (ganz Anderen) than beings, so that w/in this openness something like coming to presence (An-Wesen) (Being) can be given > Der Mensch ist der Platzhalter des Nichts

HDG.QB.content: why do beings have priority w/out us giving thought to “not” of beings > if metaphysics thinks Being of beings (transcendens, the surpassing) can it also think “not” of beings, that nothing that is equioriginally the Same as Being?
HDG.QB.linkedContent: why do beings have priority w/out us giving thought to “not” of beings > if metaphysics thinks Being of beings (transcendens, the surpassing) can it also think “not” of beings, that nothing that is equioriginally the Same as Being?

HDG.QB.content: “attempt to cross the line” captivated in form of representation (in ein Vorstellen gebannt) belonging to dominion (Herrschaftsbereich) of oblivion of Being > subject to doubts, like every image > but these doubts (Zweifeln) can’t touch illuminative force of images, their originary/uncircumventable presence (ursprüngliche und unumgehbare Gegenwart)—shows how little experience we have in the saying of thinking (der Sage des Denkens), in essence of such saying
HDG.QB.linkedContent: “attempt to cross the line” captivated in form of representation (in ein Vorstellen gebannt) belonging to dominion (Herrschaftsbereich) of oblivion of Being > subject to doubts, like every image > but these doubts (Zweifeln) can’t touch illuminative force of images, their originary/uncircumventable presence (ursprüngliche und unumgehbare Gegenwart)—shows how little experience we have in the saying of thinking (der Sage des Denkens), in essence of such saying

HDG.QB.content: [Heidegger’s method as Destruction then building (for dwelling)?] build path (Weg) leads back to locality (Ortschaft) of recovery (Verwindung) of metaphysics to let us journey through what is destined in overcoming (Überwindung) nihilism [not there yet, narrative yet to come] > despite rejection of text for publication [annihilation of trace], he who learns must examine more originarily, w/ greater care, the saying of reflective thinking, might leave such saying in realm of mystery one day, as highest gift (höchstes Geschenk) & greatest danger [beyond Being, the worst, totally other, risk annihilation?]
HDG.QB.linkedContent: [Heidegger’s method as Destruction then building (for dwelling)?] build path (Weg) leads back to locality (Ortschaft) of recovery (Verwindung) of metaphysics to let us journey through what is destined in overcoming (Überwindung) nihilism [not there yet, narrative yet to come] > despite rejection of text for publication [annihilation of trace], he who learns must examine more originarily, w/ greater care, the saying of reflective thinking, might leave such saying in realm of mystery one day, as highest gift (höchstes Geschenk) & greatest danger [beyond Being, the worst, totally other, risk annihilation?]

HDG.FS.content: philosophy as an attempt at conjoining, Parmenides’ en, the being of beings, being not an empty word, exchangeable currency, always concretely apprehended as present (Gegenwart), as presence (Anwesenheit)—what is relation btwn presence/unity?
HDG.FS.linkedContent: philosophy as an attempt at conjoining, Parmenides’ en, the being of beings, being not an empty word, exchangeable currency, always concretely apprehended as present (Gegenwart), as presence (Anwesenheit)—what is relation btwn presence/unity?

HDG.FS.content: logos as gathering, “projects itself toward things that appear in their gathering” > for Greek thought, presencing of human is opening inception for oppositional presencing of World > alētheia: encounter (Begegnung) btwn that which presences and being is a self-opening, welcomes (Empfang) presence [a site, Ort?] > alētheia can’t be translated as truth
HDG.FS.linkedContent: logos as gathering, “projects itself toward things that appear in their gathering” > for Greek thought, presencing of human is opening inception for oppositional presencing of World > alētheia: encounter (Begegnung) btwn that which presences and being is a self-opening, welcomes (Empfang) presence [a site, Ort?] > alētheia can’t be translated as truth

HDG.FS.content: in a sense, question of Being is entirely other (ganz andere) then that of metaphysics, which asks how being determines being as beings > question of Being inquires into Being as Being
HDG.FS.linkedContent: in a sense, question of Being is entirely other (ganz andere) then that of metaphysics, which asks how being determines being as beings > question of Being inquires into Being as Being

HDG.FS.content: ontological difference as most dangerous matter for thinking: always represents being, w/in horizon of metaphysics, as being
HDG.FS.linkedContent: ontological difference as most dangerous matter for thinking: always represents being, w/in horizon of metaphysics, as being

HDG.FS.content: ontological difference (danger that it represents being as a being): 1) the difference btwn being/beings is ontological 2) difference btwn being/beings carries along ontology, renders it possible as fundamental discipline of metaphysics > tradition moves in 2nd difference of understanding, no metaphysics recognizes difference as difference in dimension it unfolds (entfaltet)
HDG.FS.linkedContent: ontological difference (danger that it represents being as a being): 1) the difference btwn being/beings is ontological 2) difference btwn being/beings carries along ontology, renders it possible as fundamental discipline of metaphysics > tradition moves in 2nd difference of understanding, no metaphysics recognizes difference as difference in dimension it unfolds (entfaltet)

HDG.FS.content: relation btwn ontology & difference of being/beings can’t be taken up by metaphysics [overcoming metaphysics] > can’t think the foundation (Begründung), only its consequence (Folge): horizon in which ontological difference treated can’t appear as explicit them of ontology [ontology & metaphysics are here linked]
HDG.FS.linkedContent: relation btwn ontology & difference of being/beings can’t be taken up by metaphysics [overcoming metaphysics] > can’t think the foundation (Begründung), only its consequence (Folge): horizon in which ontological difference treated can’t appear as explicit them of ontology [ontology & metaphysics are here linked]

HDG.FS.content: all metaphysics rests on fundamental experience of being specific to thinker: for Kant, experience of being as “Nature” > experience (the key word of CPR), for Kant, in scientific sense, mathematical physics (science par excellence since modern times) > still today, biology becomes biophysics, can predict/prepare mastery of genesis of man, anthropology becomes anthropo-physics, appearance of cybernetics
HDG.FS.linkedContent: all metaphysics rests on fundamental experience of being specific to thinker: for Kant, experience of being as “Nature” > experience (the key word of CPR), for Kant, in scientific sense, mathematical physics (science par excellence since modern times) > still today, biology becomes biophysics, can predict/prepare mastery of genesis of man, anthropology becomes anthropo-physics, appearance of cybernetics

HDG.FS.content: what sort of positing is that by which Absolute appears for consciousness? > in Greek, positing is thesis, apothēkē means same as apophansis, let matter stand here from itself, as it is, i.e. presences (anwest) > modern positing, however, is closest to Latin repraesentatio, the re- refers back to ego cogito, re- as “back to me,” thus that which stands becomes object (all this covered over by presumptions of idealism)
HDG.FS.linkedContent: what sort of positing is that by which Absolute appears for consciousness? > in Greek, positing is thesis, apothēkē means same as apophansis, let matter stand here from itself, as it is, i.e. presences (anwest) > modern positing, however, is closest to Latin repraesentatio, the re- refers back to ego cogito, re- as “back to me,” thus that which stands becomes object (all this covered over by presumptions of idealism)

HDG.FS.content: perception as aisthēsis [?] > “with the Greeks, and precisely in the distinction btwn aisthēsis and noēsis, hell has already begun” > in perception what presences is “bodily (leibhaftig)” [vs. positing, thesis, of representation], chair, flesh
HDG.FS.linkedContent: perception as aisthēsis [?] > “with the Greeks, and precisely in the distinction btwn aisthēsis and noēsis, hell has already begun” > in perception what presences is “bodily (leibhaftig)” [vs. positing, thesis, of representation], chair, flesh

HDG.FS.content: [Heidegger going to clarify misunderstandings of Seinsfrage] > history of metaphysics has given many answers to Seinsfrage, e.g. Aristotle say energeia, not upokeimenon, latter an interpretation of beings not Being [upokeimenon as presencing (Anwesen) of island, the being as it lets itself be seen, island lies in sea]
HDG.FS.linkedContent: [Heidegger going to clarify misunderstandings of Seinsfrage] > history of metaphysics has given many answers to Seinsfrage, e.g. Aristotle say energeia, not upokeimenon, latter an interpretation of beings not Being [upokeimenon as presencing (Anwesen) of island, the being as it lets itself be seen, island lies in sea]

HDG.FS.content: difficult to accomplish anew what Greeks did when they thought Being as an appearing outside concealment (phusis), still we ask: what occurs in fact of arising-into-alētheia? > the overabundance (Überfülle), the excess (Übermass) of what presences (Anwesende), thus why Thales can only look to the heavens, relation to this thrust of presence is thaumazein [wonder] [height & excess] > in extreme opposition, when astronauts landed on moon, moon as moon disappeared, only a calculable parameter (Rechnungsgrösse) for technological enterprise of humans
HDG.FS.linkedContent: difficult to accomplish anew what Greeks did when they thought Being as an appearing outside concealment (phusis), still we ask: what occurs in fact of arising-into-alētheia? > the overabundance (Überfülle), the excess (Übermass) of what presences (Anwesende), thus why Thales can only look to the heavens, relation to this thrust of presence is thaumazein [wonder] [height & excess] > in extreme opposition, when astronauts landed on moon, moon as moon disappeared, only a calculable parameter (Rechnungsgrösse) for technological enterprise of humans

HDG.FS.content: dimension of entirely excessive [totally other?] is that in which philosophy arises (entspringt), philosophy as answer (Antwort) of a humanity struck (betroffenen) by excess of presence, philosophy as a hyper-Greek way of ek-sisting
HDG.FS.linkedContent: dimension of entirely excessive [totally other?] is that in which philosophy arises (entspringt), philosophy as answer (Antwort) of a humanity struck (betroffenen) by excess of presence, philosophy as a hyper-Greek way of ek-sisting

HDG.FS.content: how does Platonic idea (eidos) correspond to what Greeks named presence, ousia, the most extreme excess? for Plato, to change, to alter oneself (sich ändern): abwesen (to absence)—idea as pure presence, never absencing, self-maintaining-making-present, presencing presence (anwesende Anwesenheit) as what’s there in excess, ontos on (Nietzsche had strong sense of this, Twilight of…)
HDG.FS.linkedContent: how does Platonic idea (eidos) correspond to what Greeks named presence, ousia, the most extreme excess? for Plato, to change, to alter oneself (sich ändern): abwesen (to absence)—idea as pure presence, never absencing, self-maintaining-making-present, presencing presence (anwesende Anwesenheit) as what’s there in excess, ontos on (Nietzsche had strong sense of this, Twilight of…)

HDG.FS.content: destruction, strong sense of de-struere, Ab-bauen (“dis-mantling”), not devastation (Verwüsten) > destruction strives to free original meaning of Being, this original meaning is presence (Anwesenheit), governs all Greek understanding of being (w/out its knowing it) [presence worthy of the name?]
HDG.FS.linkedContent: destruction, strong sense of de-struere, Ab-bauen (“dis-mantling”), not devastation (Verwüsten) > destruction strives to free original meaning of Being, this original meaning is presence (Anwesenheit), governs all Greek understanding of being (w/out its knowing it) [presence worthy of the name?]

HDG.FS.content: Heidegger calls analysis of temporality of Dasein a non-metaphysical thinking of time > time no longer series of now moments, but horizon for understanding of being > analytic of Dasein provides equipment making possible sense of being in non-metaphysical signification: destruction achieves its goal (ihr Ziel gebracht) [?????]—but, various coverings of originary sense of being maintain essential relation to what they cover over, so that metaphysics can be read positively, transformations of original meaning all belonging to single destiny—Seinsgeschick
HDG.FS.linkedContent: Heidegger calls analysis of temporality of Dasein a non-metaphysical thinking of time > time no longer series of now moments, but horizon for understanding of being > analytic of Dasein provides equipment making possible sense of being in non-metaphysical signification: destruction achieves its goal (ihr Ziel gebracht) [?????]—but, various coverings of originary sense of being maintain essential relation to what they cover over, so that metaphysics can be read positively, transformations of original meaning all belonging to single destiny—Seinsgeschick

HDG.FS.content: since history of metaphysics presents history of concealment of being, we can now think history of being itself and make a beginning w/next step: taking-into-view being as being
HDG.FS.linkedContent: since history of metaphysics presents history of concealment of being, we can now think history of being itself and make a beginning w/next step: taking-into-view being as being

HDG.FS.content: being is not a being: the ontological difference > difference not produced by metaphysics, it maintains/subtends metaphysics > said in Kantian manner, ontological difference is condition of possibility for ontology > ontological difference reigns in all philosophy, fundamentally concealed, never thematized [Derrida’s described not declared]
HDG.FS.linkedContent: being is not a being: the ontological difference > difference not produced by metaphysics, it maintains/subtends metaphysics > said in Kantian manner, ontological difference is condition of possibility for ontology > ontological difference reigns in all philosophy, fundamentally concealed, never thematized [Derrida’s described not declared]

HDG.FS.content: [Heidegger quotes himself, discusses possibility of using same names inside/outside metaphysics (paleonym)] Humboldt: old coin w/ new conveyance
HDG.FS.linkedContent: [Heidegger quotes himself, discusses possibility of using same names inside/outside metaphysics (paleonym)] Humboldt: old coin w/ new conveyance

HDG.FS.content: Marx reverses Hegel’s idealism (uniquely), requires that Being be given precedence over consciousness [?] > for Marx, Being is production process, receives this representation from metaphysics via Hegel’s interpretation of life as process
HDG.FS.linkedContent: Marx reverses Hegel’s idealism (uniquely), requires that Being be given precedence over consciousness [?] > for Marx, Being is production process, receives this representation from metaphysics via Hegel’s interpretation of life as process

HDG.FS.content: Sein: Nichts: Selbes? > essence of metaphysics: nothing metaphysical [overcoming metaphysics] > Heidegger’s word neither on side of beings, nor simply on that of being: speaks from where horizon of difference (Differenz) becomes visible: ontological difference as condition of possibility (Bedingung der Möglichkeit) for metaphysics [differance] > Heideggerian proposition (Aussage): is difference itself, speaks of difference w/out holding onto it, thus he has abandoned (verlassen) metaphysics
HDG.FS.linkedContent: Sein: Nichts: Selbes? > essence of metaphysics: nothing metaphysical [overcoming metaphysics] > Heidegger’s word neither on side of beings, nor simply on that of being: speaks from where horizon of difference (Differenz) becomes visible: ontological difference as condition of possibility (Bedingung der Möglichkeit) for metaphysics [differance] > Heideggerian proposition (Aussage): is difference itself, speaks of difference w/out holding onto it, thus he has abandoned (verlassen) metaphysics

HDG.FS.content: “Time and Being” thought “letting” as “giving (Geben)” > giving speaks in Es gibt (il y a too ontic of a translation, refers to presence of beings) > too ontic to understand Es Gibt as letting come to presence, as if it means “to make present” > rather think Es gibt re: letting itself, presence no longer emphasized: “to let the presencing (Lassen das Anwesen)” [still presence there?] (presence of a being no long draws one’s attention but ground the being covers over to stand independent) > letting as gift (Gabe), gives only its gift, withdraws/holds back (verbirgt)
HDG.FS.linkedContent: “Time and Being” thought “letting” as “giving (Geben)” > giving speaks in Es gibt (il y a too ontic of a translation, refers to presence of beings) > too ontic to understand Es Gibt as letting come to presence, as if it means “to make present” > rather think Es gibt re: letting itself, presence no longer emphasized: “to let the presencing (Lassen das Anwesen)” [still presence there?] (presence of a being no long draws one’s attention but ground the being covers over to stand independent) > letting as gift (Gabe), gives only its gift, withdraws/holds back (verbirgt)

HDG.FS.content: when attention is drawn to the presencing (das Anwesen) of “letting-be,” this interpretation that of metaphysics [doesn’t Heidegger interpret as such in Anaximander?] > in emphasis (Betonung) on presencing, a 3rd has its place (Ort), the stress (Ton) now on letting itself, that which allows (lässt) (releases [entlässt]?) presencing, allows Being, the epochē of Being: one stands before being as being, not a form (Gestalten) of its destiny [so close to Hegel] > in emphasis to let presencing, no longer room for name Being, letting is pure giving, the it (das Es) that gives, Ereignis [beyond Being]
HDG.FS.linkedContent: when attention is drawn to the presencing (das Anwesen) of “letting-be,” this interpretation that of metaphysics [doesn’t Heidegger interpret as such in Anaximander?] > in emphasis (Betonung) on presencing, a 3rd has its place (Ort), the stress (Ton) now on letting itself, that which allows (lässt) (releases [entlässt]?) presencing, allows Being, the epochē of Being: one stands before being as being, not a form (Gestalten) of its destiny [so close to Hegel] > in emphasis to let presencing, no longer room for name Being, letting is pure giving, the it (das Es) that gives, Ereignis [beyond Being]

HDG.FS.content: approach Ereignis by looking at essence of positionality (Ge-stells) > positionality (ambiguous): completion (Vollendung)/consummation (Erfüllung) of metaphysics & (at same time) disclosive preparation (Vorbereitung) of Ereignis, photographic negative of Ereignis
HDG.FS.linkedContent: approach Ereignis by looking at essence of positionality (Ge-stells) > positionality (ambiguous): completion (Vollendung)/consummation (Erfüllung) of metaphysics & (at same time) disclosive preparation (Vorbereitung) of Ereignis, photographic negative of Ereignis

HDG.FS.content: no destinal (geschickliche) epoch of Ereignis: sending is from enowning (Das Schicken ist aus dem Ereignen) > return to Greeks only has meaning as a return to Being [?] > “step back (Schritt züruck)” (step that retreats [züruckgeht] from metaphysics [overcoming metaphysics]) has sole meaning of enabling (ermöglichen) glance ahead (Vorausblick) to what comes (was kommt) [to-come], thinking begins anew: in essence of technology thought catches sight of heralding portent (verdeckenden Vor-Schein), die verbergende Vor-Erscheinung des Ereignisses selbst
HDG.FS.linkedContent: no destinal (geschickliche) epoch of Ereignis: sending is from enowning (Das Schicken ist aus dem Ereignen) > return to Greeks only has meaning as a return to Being [?] > “step back (Schritt züruck)” (step that retreats [züruckgeht] from metaphysics [overcoming metaphysics]) has sole meaning of enabling (ermöglichen) glance ahead (Vorausblick) to what comes (was kommt) [to-come], thinking begins anew: in essence of technology thought catches sight of heralding portent (verdeckenden Vor-Schein), die verbergende Vor-Erscheinung des Ereignisses selbst

HDG.FS.content: to unfold question of meaning of Being, Being must be given > Husserl succeeded in this making present of Being, phenomenally present in category > Husserl gave Heidegger ground: “being” no mere concept, no pure abstraction > Husserl doesn’t inquire forth into Being after reaching Being as given, doesn’t ask what it means > no question for Husserl, “being” means being-object (but objectivity is a mode of presence)
HDG.FS.linkedContent: to unfold question of meaning of Being, Being must be given > Husserl succeeded in this making present of Being, phenomenally present in category > Husserl gave Heidegger ground: “being” no mere concept, no pure abstraction > Husserl doesn’t inquire forth into Being after reaching Being as given, doesn’t ask what it means > no question for Husserl, “being” means being-object (but objectivity is a mode of presence)

HDG.FS.content: no “what stands against” in Greek, no Gegenstand, no “object,” only that which, from itself, presences
HDG.FS.linkedContent: no “what stands against” in Greek, no Gegenstand, no “object,” only that which, from itself, presences

HDG.FS.content: can man bring about all these imperatives & could he break them himself? Marxism & sociology name the “imperatives”—to which we are compelled today > Heidegger gathers then in name Ge-stell, most extreme form of history of metaphysics, of the destiny of being, from epoch of objectivity to orderability, no longer objects only “consumer goods” at disposal of every consumer [w/out objectivity, is there no more consciousness?]
HDG.FS.linkedContent: can man bring about all these imperatives & could he break them himself? Marxism & sociology name the “imperatives”—to which we are compelled today > Heidegger gathers then in name Ge-stell, most extreme form of history of metaphysics, of the destiny of being, from epoch of objectivity to orderability, no longer objects only “consumer goods” at disposal of every consumer [w/out objectivity, is there no more consciousness?]

HDG.FS.content: there is a return to beginning in Being and Time, but it is through destruction, dismantling, disintegration (Auflösung) (which is sometimes awkward [ungeschickt] [?]) of what is destined as being in metaphysics > not yet in Being and Time a genuine knowledge of history of being, hence the awkwardness, naiveté of “ontological destruction” > since then, unavoidable naiveté of novice gave way to a knowing [he arrived, no more destruction?]
HDG.FS.linkedContent: there is a return to beginning in Being and Time, but it is through destruction, dismantling, disintegration (Auflösung) (which is sometimes awkward [ungeschickt] [?]) of what is destined as being in metaphysics > not yet in Being and Time a genuine knowledge of history of being, hence the awkwardness, naiveté of “ontological destruction” > since then, unavoidable naiveté of novice gave way to a knowing [he arrived, no more destruction?]

HDG.FS.content: in Greek manner, einai means to presence (Greeks speak more revealingly (zeigender)/precisely than we do) [Heidegger’s bias?] > Parmenides’ esti gar einai, genuine tautology: names Same only once, as itself: [fragment 8] “the same dwelling in the same, it lies in itself” [cf. 80 verse is eukuklos, abundant/overflowing, says on its own complete tautology] > in domain of inapparent (Unscheinbaren): presencing itself presences (anwest Anwesen selbst): “great number of indications (Zeignisse) [marks? traces?]…”, indication as sēma, what shows & lets be seen
HDG.FS.linkedContent: in Greek manner, einai means to presence (Greeks speak more revealingly (zeigender)/precisely than we do) [Heidegger’s bias?] > Parmenides’ esti gar einai, genuine tautology: names Same only once, as itself: [fragment 8] “the same dwelling in the same, it lies in itself” [cf. 80 verse is eukuklos, abundant/overflowing, says on its own complete tautology] > in domain of inapparent (Unscheinbaren): presencing itself presences (anwest Anwesen selbst): “great number of indications (Zeignisse) [marks? traces?]…”, indication as sēma, what shows & lets be seen

HDG.MA.content: artist present in sounds of his music: master’s presence in the work, only true presence > greater the artist, more his person vanishes behind his work [MOP]
HDG.MA.linkedContent: artist present in sounds of his music: master’s presence in the work, only true presence > greater the artist, more his person vanishes behind his work [MOP]

HDG.DL.content: confusion [nihilistic reading of Heidegger] re: name “Being,” because belongs to patrimony (Eigentum) of Sprache of metaphysics > bring out essence of metaphysics: bring metaphysics w/in its own limits > overcoming metaphysics: neither destruction (Zerstörung) nor denial (Verleugnung) of metaphysics (intend anything else would be childish, demean history)
HDG.DL.linkedContent: confusion [nihilistic reading of Heidegger] re: name “Being,” because belongs to patrimony (Eigentum) of Sprache of metaphysics > bring out essence of metaphysics: bring metaphysics w/in its own limits > overcoming metaphysics: neither destruction (Zerstörung) nor denial (Verleugnung) of metaphysics (intend anything else would be childish, demean history)

HDG.DL.content: on the unavoidability of metaphysics, via Kant, its unbroken rule (ungebrochene Herrschaft) [mastery] establishes itself where we don’t expect it [overcoming metaphysics?]
HDG.DL.linkedContent: on the unavoidability of metaphysics, via Kant, its unbroken rule (ungebrochene Herrschaft) [mastery] establishes itself where we don’t expect it [overcoming metaphysics?]

HDG.DL.content: hints [traces?]: enigmatic (rätselhaft), Sie winken uns zu, Sie winken ab [hints hint toward us, hint away] > “they beckon ourselves toward that from which they unexpectedly (unversehens) [unforeseeably] bear themselves toward us” > hints & gestures not signs, chiffres (latter have there habitat in metaphysics) [cf. p. 27] > hints/gestures belong to totally other (ganz anderen) Wesensraum [realm of reality?]
HDG.DL.linkedContent: hints [traces?]: enigmatic (rätselhaft), Sie winken uns zu, Sie winken ab [hints hint toward us, hint away] > “they beckon ourselves toward that from which they unexpectedly (unversehens) [unforeseeably] bear themselves toward us” > hints & gestures not signs, chiffres (latter have there habitat in metaphysics) [cf. p. 27] > hints/gestures belong to totally other (ganz anderen) Wesensraum [realm of reality?]

HDG.DL.content: ambiguity of “Being,” not metaphysical representation, but the presence of Being, presence of the two-fold (Zwiefalt), Being and beings > if we heed (beachten) this [ambiguity of twofold], phrase never becomes catchword (Schlagwort)
HDG.DL.linkedContent: ambiguity of “Being,” not metaphysical representation, but the presence of Being, presence of the two-fold (Zwiefalt), Being and beings > if we heed (beachten) this [ambiguity of twofold], phrase never becomes catchword (Schlagwort)

HDG.DL.content: since Being and Time, bring out Being of beings (not in metaphysical manner [overcoming metaphysics]), so Being itself will shine out: the presence of present things (Anwesen des Anwesenden), two-fold of two in their simple oneness (Einfalt) > language: the prevailing (Vorwaltende) and bearing up (Tragende) in relation (Bezug) of human nature to two-fold > man realizes (west) [his nature] as man by corresponding (entspricht) to the call (Zuspruch) [promise?] of two-fold, bears witness (bekundet) to two-fold in its message (Botschaft)
HDG.DL.linkedContent: since Being and Time, bring out Being of beings (not in metaphysical manner [overcoming metaphysics]), so Being itself will shine out: the presence of present things (Anwesen des Anwesenden), two-fold of two in their simple oneness (Einfalt) > language: the prevailing (Vorwaltende) and bearing up (Tragende) in relation (Bezug) of human nature to two-fold > man realizes (west) [his nature] as man by corresponding (entspricht) to the call (Zuspruch) [promise?] of two-fold, bears witness (bekundet) to two-fold in its message (Botschaft)

HDG.DL.content: language: fundamental trait (Grundzug) im hermeneutischen Bezug des Menschenwesens zur Zwiefalt von Anwesen und Anwesendem [in human nature’s relation to twofold of presence & present beings] > [we must] hear “Bezug” in this statement in a totally other way > not Bezug of demand (Brauchen) & supply (Beibringen) of commodities (Waren), man not a commodity > but man in his essence is in demand (gebraucht), this need claims him (beansprucht) > man is really man when “im Brauch (needed & used by…)” that which calls (ruft) him to preserve (verwahren) twofold
HDG.DL.linkedContent: language: fundamental trait (Grundzug) im hermeneutischen Bezug des Menschenwesens zur Zwiefalt von Anwesen und Anwesendem [in human nature’s relation to twofold of presence & present beings] > [we must] hear “Bezug” in this statement in a totally other way > not Bezug of demand (Brauchen) & supply (Beibringen) of commodities (Waren), man not a commodity > but man in his essence is in demand (gebraucht), this need claims him (beansprucht) > man is really man when “im Brauch (needed & used by…)” that which calls (ruft) him to preserve (verwahren) twofold

HDG.DL.content: the call of two-fold can’t be explained by presence or present beings, nor in terms of their relation > only two-fold itself which unfolds (enfaltet) the clarity, the clearing (Lichtung), in which Anwesende als solches and Anwesen can be discerned (unterscheidbar) for man > no longer say relation to two-fold, not an object of mental representation, but: the sway of usage (das Walten des Brauches), which we never experience (erfahren) directly [!] [arrival?] if we think (vorstellen) two-fold as difference (Unterschied) visible in comparison that tries to hold Anwesende and Anwesen apart from each other
HDG.DL.linkedContent: the call of two-fold can’t be explained by presence or present beings, nor in terms of their relation > only two-fold itself which unfolds (enfaltet) the clarity, the clearing (Lichtung), in which Anwesende als solches and Anwesen can be discerned (unterscheidbar) for man > no longer say relation to two-fold, not an object of mental representation, but: the sway of usage (das Walten des Brauches), which we never experience (erfahren) directly [!] [arrival?] if we think (vorstellen) two-fold as difference (Unterschied) visible in comparison that tries to hold Anwesende and Anwesen apart from each other

HDG.DL.content: no answer will help us, must see (erblicken) appearance as reality (Wesen) of presence (Anwesen) in its essential origin (Wesensherkunft) [no refutation of Greek thought]
HDG.DL.linkedContent: no answer will help us, must see (erblicken) appearance as reality (Wesen) of presence (Anwesen) in its essential origin (Wesensherkunft) [no refutation of Greek thought]

HDG.DL.content: transformation (Verwandlung) of thinking occurs as a passage (Wanderung), one site left for another, sites placed in discussion (Erörterung), one site (Ort) is metaphysics, the other we leave w/out a name [overcoming metaphysics] > in leaving behind metaphysics, Heidegger leaves behind aesthetics grounded in metaphysics: in such a way that we can give thought to nature of aesthetics, direct it back (verweisen) w/in its boundaries
HDG.DL.linkedContent: transformation (Verwandlung) of thinking occurs as a passage (Wanderung), one site left for another, sites placed in discussion (Erörterung), one site (Ort) is metaphysics, the other we leave w/out a name [overcoming metaphysics] > in leaving behind metaphysics, Heidegger leaves behind aesthetics grounded in metaphysics: in such a way that we can give thought to nature of aesthetics, direct it back (verweisen) w/in its boundaries

HDG.DL.content: Iki: breath of stillness of luminous delight (Entzückens) > delight: what ensnares (Entziehen), carries away (Hinzücken)—into stillness > delight is the same kind as the hint that beckons on, to and fro (des Fort- und Hin- und Her-winkens) > hint is message of the veiling that opens up (lichtenden Verhüllens) > so all presence (Anwesen) has its source in grace (Anmut): pure delight of the calling stillness (rufenden Stille)
HDG.DL.linkedContent: Iki: breath of stillness of luminous delight (Entzückens) > delight: what ensnares (Entziehen), carries away (Hinzücken)—into stillness > delight is the same kind as the hint that beckons on, to and fro (des Fort- und Hin- und Her-winkens) > hint is message of the veiling that opens up (lichtenden Verhüllens) > so all presence (Anwesen) has its source in grace (Anmut): pure delight of the calling stillness (rufenden Stille)

HDG.LP.content: the indeterminacy of man [via Trakl] means man is all too firmly confirmed as factum (Tatsache) [factical life], not yet been gathered/brought (gebracht) to firm ground (Feste), “home,” in das Einheimische ihres verhüllten Wesens > Western-European metaphysics may be struggling in vain, its way to the Unterwegs may be blocked: modern man is the animal not yet determined (fest-gestellte Tier) in its nature
HDG.LP.linkedContent: the indeterminacy of man [via Trakl] means man is all too firmly confirmed as factum (Tatsache) [factical life], not yet been gathered/brought (gebracht) to firm ground (Feste), “home,” in das Einheimische ihres verhüllten Wesens > Western-European metaphysics may be struggling in vain, its way to the Unterwegs may be blocked: modern man is the animal not yet determined (fest-gestellte Tier) in its nature

HDG.WL.content: speaking must have speakers but not as cause/effect: speakers have their presence in speaking (im Sprechen ihr Anwesen)
HDG.WL.linkedContent: speaking must have speakers but not as cause/effect: speakers have their presence in speaking (im Sprechen ihr Anwesen)

HDG.WL.content: Sage: showing, pointing out, signaling (Jean Paul called phenomena of nature “spiritual pointer” or “spiritual index finger”) > Das Wesende der Sprach ist die Sage als die Zeige > in view of Gefüge der Sage, showing not exclusively/decisively property of human activity: Das Sichzeigen kennzeichnet als Erscheinen das An- und Abwesen des Anwesenden jeglicher Art und Stufe [presence still magnetizes presence/absence: self-showing marks the appearance of every kind/rank of presence/absence of all that is present] > even when man accomplishes showing, showing preceded by an indiction that it can be shown [beyond human] > must think of human saying like this to give adequate definition des Wesenden in all speaking
HDG.WL.linkedContent: Sage: showing, pointing out, signaling (Jean Paul called phenomena of nature “spiritual pointer” or “spiritual index finger”) > Das Wesende der Sprach ist die Sage als die Zeige > in view of Gefüge der Sage, showing not exclusively/decisively property of human activity: Das Sichzeigen kennzeichnet als Erscheinen das An- und Abwesen des Anwesenden jeglicher Art und Stufe [presence still magnetizes presence/absence: self-showing marks the appearance of every kind/rank of presence/absence of all that is present] > even when man accomplishes showing, showing preceded by an indiction that it can be shown [beyond human] > must think of human saying like this to give adequate definition des Wesenden in all speaking

HDG.WL.content: even w/out organs, language speaks (Sprache spricht) > language speaks by saying, i.e. showing > this is how language speaks: language as showing, reaches into all regions of presences (Anwesens), summoning what is present (Anwesendes) to appear & fade > what language says (Sagen) wells up (entquillt) from what has been said and the still remaining unsaid Sage, which pervades (durchzieht) the Aufriss des Sprachwesens
HDG.WL.linkedContent: even w/out organs, language speaks (Sprache spricht) > language speaks by saying, i.e. showing > this is how language speaks: language as showing, reaches into all regions of presences (Anwesens), summoning what is present (Anwesendes) to appear & fade > what language says (Sagen) wells up (entquillt) from what has been said and the still remaining unsaid Sage, which pervades (durchzieht) the Aufriss des Sprachwesens

HDG.WL.content: a way (Weg): allows us to reach something (lässt gelangen) [arrival] > peculiarity (Eigentümliche) of language conceals itself > that we are allowed to listen, we belong to language, this belonging contains actual presence (eigentlich Wesende) of way to language [proximity to facticity of language] > essence of Saying will only make itself manifest (bekunden) if we attend (achten) w/ great instancy to what the foregoing Erläuterung has offered
HDG.WL.linkedContent: a way (Weg): allows us to reach something (lässt gelangen) [arrival] > peculiarity (Eigentümliche) of language conceals itself > that we are allowed to listen, we belong to language, this belonging contains actual presence (eigentlich Wesende) of way to language [proximity to facticity of language] > essence of Saying will only make itself manifest (bekunden) if we attend (achten) w/ great instancy to what the foregoing Erläuterung has offered

HDG.WL.content: [method of arrival, in the instant?] we need a plain, sudden, unforgettable thus forever new look (Blick) into something we don’t even try to know > the quick and stirring regsames Erregende) of Saying: earliest/most ancient at once, region of all places, first break of dawn for all that is present/absent, that which makes the cycle of day/night possible: Das Regende im Zeigen der Sage ist das Eignen ——Eignen (Owning) that moves Saying as Showing is Ereignis, yields (er-gibt) opening of the clearing, in which present beings can persist (anwähren) & absent beings can depart, while keeping (behalten) their persistence (Währen) in withdrawal (im Entzug) [cf. erasure of trace] > das Ereignende [what is yielding] ist das Ereignis selbst—nothing else > Ereignis can’t be represented as occurrence (Vorkommnis) or happening (Geschehen), “can only be experienced as abiding gift yielded (Gewährende) by saying” > Ereignis is not the result of something, but the giving yield (Er-gebnis), whose giving along gives us Es gibt, to which even Being needs to come [so to come] into its own as presence (um als Anwesen in sein Eigenes zu gelangen)
HDG.WL.linkedContent: [method of arrival, in the instant?] we need a plain, sudden, unforgettable thus forever new look (Blick) into something we don’t even try to know > the quick and stirring regsames Erregende) of Saying: earliest/most ancient at once, region of all places, first break of dawn for all that is present/absent, that which makes the cycle of day/night possible: Das Regende im Zeigen der Sage ist das Eignen ——Eignen (Owning) that moves Saying as Showing is Ereignis, yields (er-gibt) opening of the clearing, in which present beings can persist (anwähren) & absent beings can depart, while keeping (behalten) their persistence (Währen) in withdrawal (im Entzug) [cf. erasure of trace] > das Ereignende [what is yielding] ist das Ereignis selbst—nothing else > Ereignis can’t be represented as occurrence (Vorkommnis) or happening (Geschehen), “can only be experienced as abiding gift yielded (Gewährende) by saying” > Ereignis is not the result of something, but the giving yield (Er-gebnis), whose giving along gives us Es gibt, to which even Being needs to come [so to come] into its own as presence (um als Anwesen in sein Eigenes zu gelangen)

HDG.WL.content: Humboldt: inner illumination could impart such a different form to language, it would become totally other (ganz anderen) and new [presence worthy of the name?], an old shell (Gehäuse) w/ a new meaning
HDG.WL.linkedContent: Humboldt: inner illumination could impart such a different form to language, it would become totally other (ganz anderen) and new [presence worthy of the name?], an old shell (Gehäuse) w/ a new meaning

HDG.EC.content: historiological reckoning a consequence of devastation, man rolls into nothing > nihilism only historically actual when abandonment of beings by being occurs: this abandonment still lets beings be [?] > Nietzsche did not grasp essence of nihilism, remained caught (gefangen) in it, his metaphysics prepares for complete, unconditional nihilism, belongs to process of devastation
HDG.EC.linkedContent: historiological reckoning a consequence of devastation, man rolls into nothing > nihilism only historically actual when abandonment of beings by being occurs: this abandonment still lets beings be [?] > Nietzsche did not grasp essence of nihilism, remained caught (gefangen) in it, his metaphysics prepares for complete, unconditional nihilism, belongs to process of devastation

HDG.EC.content: in waiting we let things into where we ourselves belong, in rest (i.e. in return to themselves) > things, once returning as such, bring their own presence (Gegenwart) from themselves toward (entgegen) us, they fill out the emptiness that seems to gape around us as we wait > by not waiting on this restful repose, by hastening toward progress, humans become pacesetter (Schrittmacher) of devastation
HDG.EC.linkedContent: in waiting we let things into where we ourselves belong, in rest (i.e. in return to themselves) > things, once returning as such, bring their own presence (Gegenwart) from themselves toward (entgegen) us, they fill out the emptiness that seems to gape around us as we wait > by not waiting on this restful repose, by hastening toward progress, humans become pacesetter (Schrittmacher) of devastation

HDG.OHF.content: “toward the objective,” “Platonism of barbarians” [reference to Republic], objective metaphysics: what kind of being stands in forehaving here? Vorhandensein, Gegenwärtigsein, the present transformation of culture > “Vorhaben, Vorgriff: bestimmen = übersehbar machen” [this final sentence seems to show that there is showing in defining limitations of today]
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: “toward the objective,” “Platonism of barbarians” [reference to Republic], objective metaphysics: what kind of being stands in forehaving here? Vorhandensein, Gegenwärtigsein, the present transformation of culture > “Vorhaben, Vorgriff: bestimmen = übersehbar machen” [this final sentence seems to show that there is showing in defining limitations of today]

HDG.OHF.content: [method, Heidegger now explains how the analysis will bring factical Dasein into view, e.g. uncover curiosity in its categorial-ontological character, see Dasein in presence of existentials showing up (herausspringenden)]
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: [method, Heidegger now explains how the analysis will bring factical Dasein into view, e.g. uncover curiosity in its categorial-ontological character, see Dasein in presence of existentials showing up (herausspringenden)]
